item.title: Visualizing time relativeness
item.description: What is this? What does a billion years mean to you? Does replacing years with something else help? It is hard for me to grasp that number. Our universe came into existence about 13.6 billion years ago. What does human existence mean in this timespan? This is an attempt in trying to build a perspective for the time and in a way, large numbers. How? Let’s try out two methods:
